src/newtonERP/orm/sgbd/sqlite/SgbdSqliteBackupManager.java

00001 package newtonERP.orm.sgbd.sqlite;
00002 
00003 import java.io.File;
00004 import java.io.FileInputStream;
00005 import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
00006 import java.io.FileOutputStream;
00007 import java.io.IOException;
00008 import java.io.InputStream;
00009 import java.io.OutputStream;
00010 
00011 import newtonERP.logging.Logger;
00012 import newtonERP.orm.BackupManager;
00013 
00018 public class SgbdSqliteBackupManager
00019 {
00020         private static long latestBackupTime;
00021 
00022         private static String backupDirectoryPath = "./sqliteDbBackup/";
00023 
00028         public void doBackup(String originalFileName, int maxBackupCount)
00029         {
00030                 if (countBackupFile(originalFileName) > maxBackupCount)
00031                         deleteFile(getEarliestBackupFile(originalFileName));
00032 
00033                 long currentTime = BackupManager.getCurrentTime();
00034 
00035                 copyFile("./" + originalFileName, backupDirectoryPath
00036                                 + originalFileName + "." + currentTime);
00037 
00038                 latestBackupTime = currentTime;
00039         }
00040 
00041         private void deleteFile(String fileName)
00042         {
00043                 File file = new File(backupDirectoryPath + fileName);
00044                 file.delete();
00045         }
00046 
00047         private String getEarliestBackupFile(String originalFileName)
00048         {
00049                 File folder = new File(backupDirectoryPath);
00050                 File[] listOfFiles = folder.listFiles();
00051 
00052                 for (int i = 0; i < listOfFiles.length; i++)
00053                 {
00054                         if (!listOfFiles[i].isDirectory()
00055                                         && listOfFiles[i].getName().startsWith(
00056                                                         originalFileName + "."))
00057                         {
00058                                 return listOfFiles[i].getName();
00059                         }
00060                 }
00061                 return null;
00062         }
00063 
00064         private int countBackupFile(String originalFileName)
00065         {
00066                 int count = 0;
00067                 File folder = new File(backupDirectoryPath);
00068                 File[] listOfFiles = folder.listFiles();
00069 
00070                 for (int i = 0; i < listOfFiles.length; i++)
00071                 {
00072                         if (!listOfFiles[i].isDirectory()
00073                                         && listOfFiles[i].getName().startsWith(
00074                                                         originalFileName + "."))
00075                         {
00076                                 count++;
00077                         }
00078                 }
00079                 return count;
00080         }
00081 
00082         private void copyFile(String sourceFile, String destinationFile)
00083         {
00084                 try
00085                 {
00086                         File f1 = new File(sourceFile);
00087                         File f2 = new File(destinationFile);
00088                         InputStream in = new FileInputStream(f1);
00089 
00090                         // For Append the file.
00091                         // OutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(f2,true);
00092 
00093                         // For Overwrite the file.
00094                         OutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(f2);
00095 
00096                         byte[] buf = new byte[1024];
00097                         int len;
00098                         while ((len = in.read(buf)) > 0)
00099                         {
00100                                 out.write(buf, 0, len);
00101                         }
00102                         in.close();
00103                         out.close();
00104                         Logger.info("[SQLITE_BACKUP] File copied.");
00105                 } catch (FileNotFoundException ex)
00106                 {
00107                         Logger.error("[SQLITE_BACKUP] " + ex.getMessage()
00108                                         + " in the specified directory.");
00109                         System.exit(0);
00110                 } catch (IOException e)
00111                 {
00112                         Logger.error("[SQLITE_BACKUP] " + e.getMessage());
00113                 }
00114         }
00115 
00119         public long getLatestBackupTime()
00120         {
00121                 return latestBackupTime;
00122         }
00123 }
